products.name: ProBook X15 Laptop
products.description: High-performance laptop with 15.6 inch 4K display, Intel Core i7 processor, 32GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Perfect for professionals who need power and portability. Features a backlit keyboard, fingerprint reader, and all-day battery life.

products.name: BudgetBook 14
products.description: Affordable laptop for everyday computing. 14 inch Full HD display, AMD Ryzen 5 processor, 8GB RAM, and 256GB SSD. Great for students and home office use.

products.name: SmartPhone Pro Max
products.description: Flagship smartphone with 6.7 inch AMOLED display, triple camera system with 108MP main sensor, 5G connectivity, and 5000mAh battery. Water resistant and wireless charging capable.

products.name: EcoPhone Lite
products.description: Sustainable smartphone made with recycled materials. 6.1 inch LCD display, dual camera, 4G connectivity, and replaceable battery. Perfect for environmentally conscious users.

products.name: SoundMaster Pro ANC
products.description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 40-hour battery life, and Hi-Res Audio certification. Comfortable memory foam ear cushions for extended listening sessions.

products.name: SportBuds Wireless
products.description: True wireless earbuds designed for sports and fitness. IPX7 waterproof rating, secure ear hooks, 8-hour battery with charging case. Heart rate monitoring built-in.

products.name: CreativePad Pro 12
products.description: Professional tablet for digital artists with 12.9 inch Liquid Retina display, stylus support with pressure sensitivity, and powerful M2 chip. Includes 256GB storage.

products.name: KidsTab Learning Edition
products.description: Educational tablet for children with parental controls, preloaded learning apps, durable rubberized case, and 10 inch display. Safe and educational content only.

products.name: FitWatch Ultra
products.description: Advanced smartwatch with GPS, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and 100+ workout modes. AMOLED always-on display with 7-day battery life. Water resistant to 50m.

products.name: ClassicTime Smart
products.description: Elegant smartwatch with traditional watch design. Hybrid display, notification support, step counting, and 30-day battery. Perfect blend of classic style and modern features.

products.name: PhotoPro Mirrorless X1
products.description: Full-frame mirrorless camera with 45MP sensor, 8K video recording, in-body stabilization, and dual card slots. Professional-grade autofocus with eye tracking.

products.name: ActionCam 360
products.description: 360-degree action camera with 5.7K resolution, waterproof to 10m without housing, and AI-powered editing. Perfect for extreme sports and travel vlogging.

products.name: HomePod Studio
products.description: Premium smart speaker with spatial audio, room calibration, and voice assistant integration. 360-degree sound with deep bass and crystal-clear highs.

products.name: PortaSound Mini
products.description: Compact portable Bluetooth speaker with IP67 waterproof rating, 12-hour battery, and surprisingly powerful bass. Fits in your pocket for music anywhere.

products.name: UltraWide Pro 34
products.description: 34-inch curved ultrawide monitor with 3440x1440 resolution, 165Hz refresh rate, and 1ms response time. Perfect for gaming and productivity with USB-C connectivity.
